did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

did.abstract: Memoranda #2 and #6 from architect Frederick L. Ackerman to the Cornell University Buildings and Grounds Committee concerning the proposed Fine Arts Building and Music Building, 1928 and 1930.
